item.title: Protecting FleetDM with AWS WAF
item.description:
Protecting FleetDM with AWS WAF

The FleetDM web console presents a valuable interface for managing endpoints â€” and like any administrative UI, it benefits from being accessible only to trusted networks. This configuration uses AWS WAF to restrict direct access based on source IP address, ensuring that only traffic from defined locations is allowed to reach the console.

The setup blocks all traffic by default and permits access only from trusted IP ranges, such as internal corporate networks and secure gateways used by managed browsers. While broader access policies are handled through a separate zero trust architecture, the WAF provides a clear network-layer boundary that limits exposure at the edge.
